title: Eureka Seven: Pocket Full of Rainbows
alternative_title: Eureka Seven - good night, sleep tight, young lovers, 交響詩篇エウレカセブン ポケットが虹でいっぱい
description: In the year 2054, there is a boy on board the Gekko, the mother ship of the 303rd Independent Horde under the command of Holland Novak. His name is Renton and his dream is to ride into battle on his Nirvash. He has resolved to one day rescue Eureka, his childhood friend who was kidnapped eight years ago, and to return home.
